mapper.insert: insert into REVIEW(review_id, products_id, users_id, review_title, review_content, review_star, review_img) values (REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{products_id},#{users_id},#{review_title},#{review_content},#{review_star},#{review_img})
mapper.select: select review_id, products_id, users_id, review_title, review_content, review_star, review_img from REVIEW where review_id=#{review_id}
select review_id, products_id, users_id, review_title, review_content, review_star, review_img from REVIEW
